message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and think you'd really appreciate it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While I value the product at more than $90, I'm willing to come down a bit to $95. It's still a great deal for you, and we can close this deal quickly.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I really want to make this deal work, but I'm on a tight budget. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
